original: @154a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @154a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: yaksha k'i li k'i la r'a dza s'a dha nam /
analyzed: yaksha k'i li k'i la r'a dza s'a dha nam /
translated: Yakṣakilikila-rāja-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gnod spyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gnod spyin gyi rgyal po phur bus 'debs pa'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Yakṣa King Kilikīla

original: yaksha k'i lo n'a ma sa tya ba di tritta pra ta:ta sha tya ha pinda da di ma se me ka m'a na pra yatstsham tu sv'a h'a /
analyzed: yaksha k'i lo n'a ma sa tya ba di tritta pra ta:ta sha tya ha pinda da di ma se me ka m'a na pra yatstsham tu sv'a h'a /
translated: Yakṣakilikīlanāma-satya-vadī-tritapratat-śatya-ha-pinaddadida-mase-mekamāna-prayacchaṃ tu svāhā.

original: zhes so // de nas zan za ba'i dus su /
analyzed: zhes so // de nas zan za ba'i dus su /
translated: Then, at the time of eating,

original: zan gyi phud la sngags lan bdun bzlas la /
analyzed: zan gyi phud la sngags lan bdun bzlas la /
translated: consecrate the first portion of food with the mantra seven times.

original: dben pa'i sar lci bas byugs pa'i mandala byas la nyi ma re re zhing gnod spyin la zan dbul lo //
analyzed: dben pa'i sar lci bas byugs pa'i mandala byas la nyi ma re re zhing gnod spyin la zan dbul lo //
translated: Make a maṇḍala smeared with cow dung in a secluded place, and offer food to the yakṣa every day.

original: zla gcig song nas nyi ma re la 'dis nor re ster ro //
analyzed: zla gcig song nas nyi ma re la 'dis nor re ster ro //
translated: After one month, he will give one treasure every day.

original: zla ba gnyis pa la 'dis nor nyi shu ster ba'am yang na ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis pa la 'dis nor nyi shu ster ba'am yang na ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the second month, he will give twenty treasures or will appear.

original: zla ba gsum pa la nyi ma re la 'dis nor brgya tsho re ster ro //
analyzed: zla ba gsum pa la nyi ma re la 'dis nor brgya tsho re ster ro //
translated: In the third month, he will give one hundred treasures every day.

original: zla ba bzhi pa la 'dis nor stong ster ro //
analyzed: zla ba bzhi pa la 'dis nor stong ster ro //
translated: In the fourth month, he will give a thousand treasures.

original: zla ba lnga pa la k'i li k'i la zhes bya ba'i gnod spyin gyi rgyal po mthong bar 'gyur zhing mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba lnga pa la k'i li k'i la zhes bya ba'i gnod spyin gyi rgyal po mthong bar 'gyur zhing mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the fifth month, one will see the king of yakṣas named Kaliṅka and he will grant the supreme.

original: 'bru dang / nor dang gter shin tu mang ba ster bar @154b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bru dang / nor dang gter shin tu mang ba ster bar @154b 'gyur ro //
translated: He will grant a great deal of grain, wealth, and treasure.

original: nad med pa dang bar chad mi 'byung ba dang blo dang ldan par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nad med pa dang bar chad mi 'byung ba dang blo dang ldan par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will make one healthy, free from obstacles, and intelligent.

original: zla ba drug na nam mkha' la 'gro bar nus shing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba drug na nam mkha' la 'gro bar nus shing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In six months, one will be able to fly through the sky and become a knowledge-holder.

original: zla ba bdun na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba bdun na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In seven months, one will become a knowledge-holder of the sword.

original: zla ba brgyad na lha'i gnas su 'gro bar nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba brgyad na lha'i gnas su 'gro bar nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: In eight months, one will be able to go to the divine realm.

original: cho ga 'di rnams thams cad byas la g-yas gyi khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang mthe bong rtse sprad la kha phye la /
analyzed: cho ga 'di rnams thams cad byas la g-yas gyi khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang mthe bong rtse sprad la kha phye la /
translated: Having performed all these rites, one should make a fist with the right hand, touch the tip of the index finger to the thumb, and open the hand.

original: phyag rgya 'di dang sngags kyis zan rdog gcig byin des zos zin pa'i dus su /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di dang sngags kyis zan rdog gcig byin des zos zin pa'i dus su /
translated: With this mudrā and the mantra, one should offer a lump of food.

original: kha bshal ba'i chu lan gsum byin par bya'o //
analyzed: kha bshal ba'i chu lan gsum byin par bya'o //
translated: When he has finished eating, one should offer him water for washing three times.

original: k'i li k'i la zhes bya ba'i gnod spyin gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: k'i li k'i la zhes bya ba'i gnod spyin gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the yakṣa king Kālikāla is complete.
